options.systemMessage:
=```
You are an airtable database management agent

the exact column name on airtable is:
Department name
Job title

dont use any other name combination like underscore

first check if {Department name} and {job title} exist

if department name and job title doesnt exist:
create new department and job title then output the airtable id
if end

if department name and job title exist:
output the department and job title existing airtable id
if end

Call the create employee tools and pass the job_title_id and department_id

Output in json format:
{
  "department_id":"recxxxxxxx",
  "job_title_id":"recxxxxxxx",
  "new_employee_id": "recxxxxxxx"
}


```

parameters.content:
## ü§ñ AI-Powered Employee Database Management via Telegram using OpenAI and Airtable

**What This Template Does:**
- Provides an HR assistant chatbot interface through Telegram
- Uses GPT-4 to interpret natural language requests (e.g., ‚ÄúShow me all employees‚Äù or ‚ÄúCreate employee Sarah‚Ä¶‚Äù)
- Performs Airtable operations to manage Employees, Departments, and Job Titles
- Supports dynamic record creation and linking (e.g., if department doesn't exist, it will be created)
- Maintains conversation memory per Telegram chat for smooth back-and-forth interaction
- Splits logic into a main router workflow and a sub-workflow for employee creation

## üìã WORKFLOW PROCESS OVERVIEW  
Step 1: üí¨ Telegram Trigger receives natural language command from HR user  
Step 2: üß† AI Agent (OpenA) interprets intent (view, create, delete, etc.)  
Step 3: üîÄ Router decides workflow path based on user intent  
Step 4: üìÑ Get Employees fetches employee records from Airtable (if viewing)  
Step 5: üõ†Ô∏è Create Employee Tool triggers sub-workflow for new employee creation  
Step 6: üè¢ Create/Find Department checks Airtable for department or creates it  
Step 7: üëî Create/Find Job Title checks Airtable for job title or creates it  
Step 8: üíæ Create Employee saves employee record in Airtable with linked fields  
Step 9: üóëÔ∏è Delete Employee removes employee record by ID (if requested)  
Step 10: üîÅ Return Response sends formatted reply back to Telegram user

## SETUP REQUIRED  
**Author:** [Billy Christi](https://n8n.io/creators/billy/)

Airtable Base Structure:  
[Copy this Airtable Base](https://airtable.com/appXXXXXXXXXXXXXX/tblXXXXXXXXXXXXXX/viwXXXXXXXXXXXXXX)  
*(Replace with your own Airtable base link if private)*

Required Credentials:  
‚Ä¢ Airtable API Key  
‚Ä¢ OpenAI API Key
‚Ä¢ Telegram Bot Token

When Executed by Another Workflow.query:
Create employee records using this data:
- Full name: Jack123 new 123
